title: Anyone have a T213-1 HOFer or Chase to sell or trade?
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Anyone have a T213-1 HOFer or Chase to sell or trade?
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Looking for a T213 Type 1 HOFer to add to the back line. I thought I had one in the Spring ML auction, but fell asleep right at the close after hours of no bids!

Let me know if anyone can part with one. 

Thanks,
Bob
